creator: Axblare
descriptionHtml:
Modified cross-platform reimplementation of a Chinese RPG game. Please see https://github.com/sdlpal/sdlpal for more information.

This modified version features:
- Separated control buttons on display;
- Landscape/portrait screen orientation;
- 简体中文/繁體中文/English easy setup.

Fairy Sword (this app) is open source (using GPLv3 license): https://drive.google.com/open?id=1XoGp7XUE8Gezuuz95tgDMxwVvAyYRy2b.

Game assets will be downloaded and unzipped on the first run. 267 MB free storage space is needed after installing the app.

NOTE:
The original game is now free and can be downloaded legally: http://update1.baiyou100.com/resource/Pal98rqp.zip.
descriptionShort: Modified cross-platform reimplementation of a Chinese RPG
